protocol.name: P-GSE35544-2
protocol.text: Plants were treated at the onset of the light period on day 15 with 5 mM KNO3 or 5 mM KCl as control for 2 hours. Roots were cut and frozen on liquid nitrogen.

protocol.name: P-GSE35544-3
protocol.text: Arabidopsis seedlings of the Ws and afb3-1 genotypes were grown on hydroponic medium containing 1X MS salts without Nitrogen, supplemented with 0.5 mM ammonium succinate as Nitrogen source and 3 mM sucrose on a Percival chamber under a photoperiod of 16 hours of light (100 μE/m2/sec) and 8 hours of dark at 22°C for 14 days.

protocol.name: P-GSE35544-4
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted using the TriZol reagent as indicated by the manufacturer.

protocol.name: P-GSE35544-5
protocol.text: Bioitinylated cRNA was prepared using the GeneChip 3'IVT kit from Affymetrix

protocol.name: P-GSE35544-6
protocol.text: ATH1 chips were hybridized using the GeneChip Hybridization, Wash and Stain kit from Affymetrix

protocol.name: P-GSE35544-7
protocol.text: Chips were scanned using the Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner 3000 7G and the Affymetrix GeneChip Command Console Scan Control 1.1.0.845 software

protocol.name: P-GSE35544-8
protocol.text: The summarized probe set data was generated using R/bioconductor (affy library). Normalization of the data was performed using rma. Normalized data was subjected to a two-way ANOVA analysis with a false discovery rate of 5 %.
